text: Louis Diamond Phillips (n√© Upchurch; born February 17, 1962) is a Filipino- American actor and movie director. He is known for his role as Ritchie Valens in the biographical drama movie La Bamba (1987). ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American movie directors Category:American television directors Category:Actors from Texas Category:People from Corpus Christi, Texas Category:People from Zambales
